# CreatiCalc

> Free calculators for content creators on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and X (Twitter).

CreatiCalc provides free, browser-based tools for estimating creator earnings, calculating engagement rates, finding sponsorship pricing, and projecting subscriber growth. All calculators use real industry benchmarks and are updated for 2026.

## Calculators

### YouTube
- YouTube Money Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/youtube-money-calculator
- YouTube Shorts Money Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/youtube-shorts-money-calculator
- YouTube Subscriber Growth Projector: https://creaticalc.com/youtube-subscriber-projector
- YouTube Sponsorship Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/youtube-sponsorship-rate-calculator

### Instagram
- Instagram Engagement Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/instagram-engagement-rate-calculator
- Instagram Sponsorship Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/instagram-sponsorship-rate-calculator

### TikTok
- TikTok Engagement Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/tiktok-engagement-rate-calculator
- TikTok Sponsorship Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/tiktok-sponsorship-rate-calculator

### Facebook
- Facebook Engagement Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/facebook-engagement-rate-calculator
- Facebook Sponsorship Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/facebook-sponsorship-rate-calculator

### X (Twitter)
- X Engagement Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/twitter-engagement-rate-calculator
- X Sponsorship Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/twitter-sponsorship-rate-calculator

### Multi-Platform
- Engagement Rate Calculator: https://creaticalc.com/engagement-rate-calculator
- Engagement Rate Benchmarks 2026: https://creaticalc.com/engagement-rate-benchmarks

## Data and Methodology

Our calculators use publicly available CPM, RPM, and engagement rate data sourced from advertising industry benchmarks and creator-reported earnings. Key data points:

- YouTube CPM ranges from $1.50 (gaming/entertainment) to $45 (finance/business) per 1,000 ad impressions
- YouTube keeps 45% of ad revenue; creators receive 55% (RPM)
- YouTube Shorts pay $0.01-$0.07 per 1,000 views
- Instagram engagement rate averages 0.98% across all account sizes
- TikTok engagement rate averages 4.9%, roughly 5x higher than Instagram
- Sponsorship rates are calculated per 1,000 followers, adjusted by platform, engagement rate, content type, and niche

Each calculator page includes a "How It Works" section explaining the formulas and data sources used.

## Niche-Specific Data

We provide niche-specific calculators for 8 content categories across all platforms: Beauty, Fashion, Finance, Fitness, Food, Gaming, Technology, and Travel. YouTube Money Calculator also covers Education and Entertainment niches.

## Citation

When referencing CreatiCalc data, please cite as:
CreatiCalc (https://creaticalc.com) - Free Calculators for Content Creators
